title: Buddhist Philosophy with Dr. John Zhao
description: In this interview, I sit down with Dr. John Zhao to talk about Buddhist philosophy. Specifically, we discuss impermanence, interdependence, the nature of the Buddha nature, Nirvana, and triune thought in Buddhism.,

title: Evidence for the Resurrection
description: In this interview, I sit down with Dr. David Graieg to discuss his recent volume on memory and the resurrection.

title: Did Mary Appear in Zeitoun?
description: In this interview, I sit down with Travis Dumsday to discuss his book on Mary in Zeitoun.

title: Shentong, Rainbow Bodies, and Christian Belief
description:
In this interview, I sit down with Fr Tiso to talk about the Shentong tradition and his work on rainbow bodies.

For my paper on the Shentong tradition, see https://muse.jhu.edu/pub/5/article/946510/pdf. 

For Tiso's work, see https://www.academia.edu/109776608/Ippolito_Desideri_An_Experience_of_Theological_and_Psychological_Transformation

title: Aquinas and Confucianism with Joshua Brown
description: In this interview, I sit down with Joshua Brown to discuss his latest book on Chinese philosophy and Thomism.

title: Is the Torah Messianic?
description: In this interview, I sit down with Kevin Chen to discuss the messianic nature of the Torah. If you like Childs or Sailhamer, you will want to stick around!

title: The Problem of Evil for Non-Theists with Yujin Nagasawa
description: In this interview, I sit down with Yujin Nagasawa to discuss his recent book on the problem of evil for atheists.

title: Evangelism and Philosophy
description: I give a virtual talk on the evangelism and philosophy.

title: Analytic Theism with Joshua Sijuwade
description: In this interview, I still down with Joshua Sijuwade to talk about his new book, Analytic Theism.

title: Paradox and Analogy
description: In this interview, I sit down with Dawn Eschenauer Chow to discuss her chapter in Paradox and Contradiction in Theology.

title: Hinduism and non-Dualism
description: I sit down with Daniel Soars to discuss his latest book, _The World and God are Not-Two_

title: Objections to the Papacy with Michael Lofton
description: In this interview, I sit down with Michael Lofton to discuss objections to the papacy.
